On June 6, 2008, in the Diet of the Diet of the Diet, "a resolution calling for the Ainu people to be indigenous peoples" was adopted by all partnership agreement. In addition to me, the bipartisan parliamentarians elected in Hokkaido, especially the parliamentary association who considers the establishment of the rights of the Ainu people, established the parliament association who thinks of the rights of the Ainu people, and from the standpoint of having discussed with the delegates of each faction as a chairman until this resolution was adopted,

The saying "There is no Ainu people anymore" by Sapporo's LDP city council can not be overlooked. At that time, Nobutaka Machimura (current Liberal Democratic Party leader chairperson) Chief Cabinet Secretary was released. In that sense, I would like to ask the chairman of the town and villa LDP party deeply involved as Chief Cabinet Secretary about the insight into this problem, and to practice responsible politics.

"Resolution seeking to make Ainu peoples indigenous" http://t.co/pI7PlK7wnA (House of Representatives) http://t.co/uvaLYJjXYZ (House of Councilors) "Resolution seeking to make Ainu racial as indigenous people" Chief Cabinet Secretary on the matter http://t.co/l8gakHwnJ1 (official residence)
